page.name: Mentoring Mason Men
page.description: Mentoring Mason Men also known as "MMM" is a young menâ€™s group that is based on hanging out with the guys.  The group is a place where students of all kinds can get together and share a good time. Guys from the football, basketball, soccer, lacrosse and wrestling teams all hang out in MMM. Male teachers and coaches at Mason all hang out in this fun non-classroom setting, giving students a positive male influence.  Whether it is attending a Mason sporting event, playing outside, shooting hoops, playing football, playing video games, etc.  The group meets once or twice a month.
